ing: 4 tablespoons Country CrockÂ® Spread, melted, divided
8 ounces dry rotini pasta, cooked and drained
2 1/4 cups finely shredded low-fat Cheddar cheese
n: Easy Mac and Cheese Veggie Chicken Casserole from Country CrockÂ®
des: "Cooked pasta is combined with cheese, diced cooked chicken, and veggies then popped in the oven for a quick, family-pleasing, one-dish dinner."
ins:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Combine 3 tablespoons Country Crock(R) Spread, milk, rotini, chicken, vegetables and cheddar cheese in 8-inch baking dish.
Combine bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese and remaining Spread in small bowl; sprinkle over top of casserole.
Bake until heated through and crumbs are toasted, about 30 minutes.
